de.lessvoid.nifty.sound
Class SoundSystem

java.lang.Object
  de.lessvoid.nifty.sound.SoundSystem

public class SoundSystem
extends Object

The SoundManager loads and manages all available Sound and Music Files available to be played.

Author:
void
